message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I think you'll really appreciate its value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. What do you think?

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the product, but $15000 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now. I'm interested in buying, but I can only go up to $12000.  Let me know if you're open to discussing that.
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can sell it to you for $14000. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $14000 is still a bit more than I can comfortably afford. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm firm on my offer of $12000. Is there any flexibility on your side?

I understand you're firm on $12000, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I can see you're interested in the product, so I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell it to you for $13500. That's the lowest I'm willing to go. What do you think?
